price: Àwọn tó ń ná dúkìá wọn ní òru àti ní ọ̀sán, ní ìkọ̀kọ̀ àti ní gban̄gba, ẹ̀san wọn ń bẹ fún wọn ní ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa wọn. Kò sí ìpáyà fún wọn. Wọn kò sì níí banújẹ́.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمۡوَٰلَهُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ سِرّٗا وَعَلَانِيَةٗ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
